title: Process ready duration is high when one tiflash is down
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
v6.1.1

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->
Not related 

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->
Having 44w regions for one store, and one tiflash is down

### What did you expect?
No difference

### What did happened?
Process ready duration increases
![unrn7TdaK9](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13497871/198187591-d169a79a-11f5-4c72-99dd-a4b007a1d1bf.jpg)
